A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A so-called film of endless cliches\, tasteless plots\, bland heroes & villains\, one-dimensional characters\, plot-devices\, plot-holes\, vacant character development\, atrocious character execution\, uninspired writing prompts\, purposelessness\, plot-induced-stupidity\, a counterfeited soundtrack\, and is overall a carbon copy of The Empire Strikes Back. The future for Disney's new Saga is grim\, to say the least.
